headline: How Analysts See the Story Behind Electronic Arts Shifting After the Take Private Offer
summary: Electronic Arts stock is entering a new phase, as analysts largely converge on the proposed $210 per share take private price while keeping their long term valuation anchors steady. With fair value, discount rate, and revenue growth assumptions all effectively unchanged, the story is shifting from public market upside potential to the odds and implications of deal completion. Stay tuned to see how you can track this evolving narrative and monitor future shifts in expectations around the...

headline: LightHeaded Helmets Debuts First-of-Its-Kind Luxury Memorabilia as Official Sponsor of the 2026 Madden Bowl and EA SPORTS™ College Football 26
summary: Pre-sale launches ahead of LightHeaded’s full EA SPORTS partnership RevealBOERNE, Texas, Dec. 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LightHeaded Helmets, the emerging standout in premium sports collectibles, today announced a major partnership with Electronic Arts (EA), becoming an official in-game and event sponsor across two of the most anticipated titles and events in football gaming: EA SPORTS™ College Football 26 and the 2026 Madden Bowl.
